Toaster

The toaster component is a container for a number of stacked alerts, which provide an overview of user actions. If the user closes an alert, it is removed from the toaster.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-toaster

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-toaster

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-toaster/src/scss/toaster";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Import JS

                  
                  import { Toaster } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-toaster';

Set the data-vl-toaster-fadeout="true" attribute to make an alert fade out after 5 seconds. Set this attribute to false or remove it to keep an alert from fading. Change the default position of the toaster (top-right) by adding a class modifier. The possible class options are vl-toaster--top-left, vl-toaster--bottom-right and vl-toaster--bottom-left.

Alert error

Donec sed odio dui. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.

Alert warning

Donec sed odio dui. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.

Alert success

Donec sed odio dui. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.

Alert cta

Donec sed odio dui. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.

      
<div class="vl-toaster vl-toaster--top-left"
  data-vl-toaster
  data-vl-toaster-fadeout="true"><div class="vl-alert vl-alert--error" role="alert">
    <div class="vl-alert__icon">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-warning" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    </div>
    <button class="vl-alert__close" type="button">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Sluiten</span>
    </button>
    <div class="vl-alert__content">
      <p class="vl-alert__title">Alert error</p>
      <div class="vl-alert__message"><p>Donec sed odio dui. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.</p>
</div>
    </div>
    <button class="vl-alert__close" type="button">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Sluiten</span>
    </button>
    </div><div class="vl-alert vl-alert--warning" role="alert">
    <div class="vl-alert__icon">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-warning" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    </div>
    <button class="vl-alert__close" type="button">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Sluiten</span>
    </button>
    <div class="vl-alert__content">
      <p class="vl-alert__title">Alert warning</p>
      <div class="vl-alert__message"><p>Donec sed odio dui. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.</p>
</div>
    </div>
    <button class="vl-alert__close" type="button">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Sluiten</span>
    </button>
    </div><div class="vl-alert vl-alert--success" role="alert">
    <div class="vl-alert__icon">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-check" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    </div>
    <button class="vl-alert__close" type="button">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Sluiten</span>
    </button>
    <div class="vl-alert__content">
      <p class="vl-alert__title">Alert success</p>
      <div class="vl-alert__message"><p>Donec sed odio dui. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.</p>
</div>
    </div>
    <button class="vl-alert__close" type="button">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Sluiten</span>
    </button>
    </div><div class="vl-alert vl-alert--cta" role="alert">
    <div class="vl-alert__icon">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-mail" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    </div>
    <div class="vl-alert__content">
      <p class="vl-alert__title">Alert cta</p>
      <div class="vl-alert__message"><p>Donec sed odio dui. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.</p>
</div>
      <div class="vl-alert__actions">
        <button class="vl-button vl-button--narrow">
    Button to page
  </button>
      </div>
    </div></div>
</div>
